nav.div: Portola Valley School District » Schools » Lunch Program

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background: rgb(254, 254, 254); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background: rgb(254, 254, 254); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.span:
There are various agencies supporting the families of San Mateo County. Whether you are searching for assistance, or looking to help, view our list of emergency resources for families. Contact us directly at Lunch@pvsd.net if your family is in need of school supplies or groceries.
Hay muchas agencias apoyando las familias del Condado de San Mateo. Si quiere ayudar o si está buscando asistencia, vea la lista de recursos para familias. Contáctenos a Lunch@pvsd.net si necesita útiles escolares o comestibles.
Children under 18 may pick up meals at any of the sites below, regardless of school of attendance.
Portola Valley
Meals are available at the PVSD district office, please email lunch@pvsd.net to coordinate a pick-up time. Meals for the week will be provided on Monday.
Portola Valley Las comidas están disponibles en la oficina de PVSD, favor de contactarnos a lunch@pvsd.net. Los almuerzos de la semana se proporcionarán el lunes.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.span:
Jane Lathrop Stanford Middle School- 480 East Meadow Drive, Palo Alto
Gunn High School- 780 Arastradero Road, Palo Alto
Greene Middle School- 750 N California Avenue, Palo Alto
Ravenswood

10:00AM to 1:00PM, breakfast and lunch
Belle Haven Elementary - 415 Ivy Drive, Menlo Park, CA 94025
Brentwood Academy - 2086 Clarke Avenue, East Palo Alto, CA 94303
Costaño School - 2695 Fordham Street, East Palo Alto, CA 94303
Los Robles McNair Academy - 2033 Pulgas Avenue, East Palo Alto, CA 94303
Willow Oaks Elementary - 620 Willow Road, Menlo Park, CA 94025
Ravenswood Middle School - 2450 Ralmar Avenue, East Palo Alto, CA 94303
Second Harvest will provide meals for households at the Ravenswood Middle School on Saturdays between 9:00 AM and 12:00 PM.
Boys and Girls Club:
East Palo Alto Clubhouse - 2031 Pulgas Ave, East Palo Alto
To-Go Dinner Service: 6-7pm, Monday-Friday
Grocery Boxes: 6-7pm, Fridays
Redwood City Clubhouse - 1109 Hilton Ave, Redwood City
To-Go Dinner Service: 5:30-6:30pm, Monday-Friday
Grocery Boxes: 5:30-6:30pm, Wednesdays

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background: rgb(254, 254, 254); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.span:
10:30 - 11:30 am Mondays, Tuesdays, and Wednesdays only.
On Wednesday, families will be able to also pick up meals for Thursday and Friday.
Henry Ford Elementary School - 2498 Massachusetts Ave, Redwood City, CA 94061
Garfield Community School - 3600 Middlefield Rd, Menlo Park, CA 94025
Hoover Community School - 701 Charter St, Redwood City, CA 94063
Roosevelt Elementary School - 2223 Vera Ave, Redwood City, CA 94061
